_sText:
This is NAV-file for [cs_sauna_b1](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/72838 "").

In some places corrected passableness, named all places. 

This is one of my favorite maps in the game with bots because: 1) as soon as someone sees someone, just a bunch of grenades flying in both directions and begins "wall to wall" 2) is a lot of fun to run with M249 ;)

But in toilet bots can enter only, nothing I can do about it, only prevent them to go to the toilet. Make a second version with a closed for bots way to the toilet?

UPDATE 7.6.2014: Bots and hostages are now not cling to the bath door handle. This greatly accelerated exit/enter of bots and hostages from/to the bath.

UPDATE 12.06.2014: Now hostages don't cling to the door jamb, and come out of the bath pretty fast. I will try to speed up exit of terrorists therefrom.

UPDATE 12.06.2014 (second): Hooray! Now all bots fly through door of the bath like bullets! :D
